figtree.treeviewer.decorators
Class DiscreteColorDecorator

java.lang.Object
  figtree.treeviewer.decorators.DiscreteColorDecorator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Decorator
public class DiscreteColorDecorator
extends java.lang.Object
implements Decorator

This decorator takes an attribute name and a set of attibutable Objects. Colours are given to each individual value. If the data take more values than colors, then they will wrap around

Version:
$Id: DiscreteColorDecorator.java 639 2007-02-15 10:05:28Z rambaut $
Author:
Andrew Rambaut
